definitions.definition: Any of two species of Old World wading bird in the genus Tringa that have long red legs.
Any of species Ceratodon purpureus of moss
Lady's thumb or redleg ( Persicaria maculosa ), an herb in the buckwheat family.
A bare-legged person; one of the Scottish Highlanders , who wore kilts .

main_definition: Any of two species of Old World wading bird in the genus Tringa that have long red legs.
secondary_definitions: Any of species Ceratodon purpureus of moss
Lady's thumb or redleg ( Persicaria maculosa ), an herb in the buckwheat family.
( obsolete , derogatory ) A bare-legged person; one of the Scottish Highlanders , who wore kilts .
